description: Erection of a front entrance porch and a front boundary wall with gate to the house
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The front boundary railings hereby approved shall not be infilled with solid material during the lifetime of development.

Condition : 6 - Prior to the completion of development hereby approved, the existing vehicular access to 40 Staveley Gardens shall be permanently closed and the kerbs/verge/footway reinstated in consultation with the Local Highways Authority so that it cannot be used as an access across the pavement.
